terms.meaning: Data communication ke liye rules aur standards.
Network mein device ka unique identifier.
Domain Name System for name resolution.
Multiple servers mein traffic distribute karne wala device.
Content Delivery Network for fast content delivery.
Network security ke liye traffic filtering system.
Virtual Private Network for secure remote access.
Network connection ki data transfer capacity.
Data transmission mein time delay.
Network devices ka physical ya logical arrangement.
Different networks ke beech data forward karne wala device.
Same network mein devices connect karne wala device.
Large network ko smaller segments mein divide karna.
Virtual Local Area Network for logical segmentation.
Network performance aur health track karna.
Network traffic prioritization aur management.
Network infrastructure ko threats se protect karna.
Internet-based computing resources.
Physical resources ko virtual environments mein divide karna.
Application packaging aur deployment technology.
Tables mein structured data storage system.
Structured Query Language for database operations.
Non-relational database for flexible data storage.
Data redundancy reduce karne ka process.
Table mein unique identifier column.
Tables ke beech relationship establish karne wala key.
terms.example: Order table mein Customer ID reference.

terms.meaning: Database query performance improve karne ka structure.
Database operations ka atomic unit.
terms.example: Bank transfer with debit and credit.

terms.meaning: Database transaction reliability ke principles.
Data loss prevent karne ke liye copy create karna.
Data ko multiple servers mein copy karna.
Large database ko smaller parts mein divide karna.
Database mein pre-compiled SQL code.
Automatic execution on database events.
terms.example: Audit log creation on data changes.

terms.meaning: Historical data analysis ke liye specialized database.
Database structure changes manage karna.
Database query performance improve karna.
Unauthorized access se database protect karna.
Database connections efficiently manage karna.
Database performance aur health track karna.
